snippet: Dana Brandwein Oates, a ceramist, and Daniel Oates, a furniture designer, live in a converted cowshed in Sharon, Conn.
abstract: Ceramist Dana Brandwein Oates and her husband, furniture designer Daniel Oates, love the separate studios they have created at their home, formerly a cowshed, in Sharon, Conn.
lead_paragraph: Dana Brandwein Oates, a ceramist, and Daniel Oates, a furniture designer, live in a converted cowshed in Sharon, Conn.

headline.print_headline: A Backdrop of Queen Anne’s Lace
headline.main: Country Living for the Creative Couple
